title: Mcap Of Five Of Top-10 Most-Valued Firms Surges Rs 72,285 Crore; TCS, Infosys Biggest Winners
description: The combined market valuation of five of the top-10 most valued firms surged by Rs 72,284.74 crore last week, with Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) and Infosys emerging as the biggest winners.
content: While Bharti Airtel, TCS, ICICI Bank, Infosys and Bajaj Finance were the gainers, Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank, State Bank of India, Larsen & Toubro, and Life Insurance Corporation of India (LI… [+37 chars]
author: PTI
text_for_sentiment: Mcap Of Five Of Top-10 Most-Valued Firms Surges Rs 72,285 Crore; TCS, Infosys Biggest Winners The combined market valuation of five of the top-10 most valued firms surged by Rs 72,284.74 crore last week, with Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) and Infosys emerging as the biggest winners.

title: HDFC Bank sees rupee falling to 92 in absence of quick US trade deal
description:
The rupee fell to an all-time low of 90.42 on
Thursday, extending an eight-month-long slide that has made it
Asia's worst-performing currency
content:
